title: Trump Announces Plan to Make Cars Pollute More
description: President Trump announced a plan to slash fuel efficiency regulations, allowing automakers to build more gas-guzzling cars.
content:
The year of the gas guzzler, it seems, will soon be upon us.
On Wednesday, president Trump announced plans to drastically lower fuel efficiency standards for new cars and pick-up trucks, the New Yor… [+3418 chars]
